title: !0th gift
body: It is weird that i only received the Riot Kayle skin, but not the Poro Icon,

replies.body: Gifts are still being rolled out, just hang tight until it's all done.  There are a lot of accounts to gift, and you may not get everyone all at once per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Patience, and it will come!
well, i thought the final day is 23rd, but now it is 24th already,  so i dont know what is going on
The gifts are still being handed out, and the final date to receive them has been moved to the 30th, as per the banner on the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us).
oh, thank you for that extra information. i thought i recieved some kind of punlishment from riot, now i feel better because i dont have to worry about it now.. thank you so much.

It's normal to receive one but not yet the other, as they are being handed out separately, not at the same time. The final day to receive them is the 23rd, so if you don't get the icon by then, you can submit a support ticket.
thank you so much, so i will check if i have it tomorrow, thank you for helping me. have a great night
